attributes.action: Abolish the House of Lords if they vote to amend the Article 50 bill.
attributes.background: The will of the British people must be respected by the House of Lords. The House of Lords must not attempt in any way to amend or attach conditions to the notification of withdrawal from the European Union bill 2017.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178288
